issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I try to insert <manifest> into the Tiapp.xml file and get an error. I have tried adding what the error requests such as package name, version, etc...

I am at a stand still on this. I did not have this trouble in my other apps that were developed prior to last TI code updates.

comments.body:
Like this?
{code:javascript}
<android xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <manifest>
        <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true"/>
    </manifest>
</android>
{code}
Please post the error message you're getting. Also state your Ti SDK and Studio version.
